metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15019 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
LAME 3.99.5 has a NULL Pointer Dereference in the hip_decode_init function within libmp3lame/mpglib_interface.c via a malformed mpg file, because of an incorrect calloc call.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-15019` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

lame - 3.100-2
libmp3lame0 - 3.100-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lame package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.100-2').
